p: Microscopic evaluation highlights the drastic reduction in the number of intact organelles among which mitochondria and membranes disrupt nuclei, mitochondria and dictyosomes [ 67]. This mitochondrial membrane deleterious effect leads to a decrease in energy production and ROS generation affecting numerous biochemical processes and cellular activities as observed for tobacco BY-2 cells treated with 1,8-cineole [ 68, 69].
